platform.headline: Threat hunting platform
platform.description: ColleaiQ runs safe, sandboxed rehearsals of relevant exposures and returns explainable, analyst-approved findings with a practical fix. Works with your tools (e.g., Velociraptor, EDR, SIEM, case management).

card.title: Threat hunting platform
card.note: Pilot pricing. Excluding taxes and partner fees. Final pricing typically goes through your SOC/MSSP.
features: Automatic hunts for newly published CVEs
Sandbox rehearsals that mirror your environment

consulting.headline: AI consulting (by scope)
consulting.description: We support scoped work in multi-agent systems, explainability, sandboxed simulation, and evaluation/reproducibility. We'll agree a clear deliverable, cadence and handover plan.
consulting.pricingNote: Pricing depends on scope and timeline. Start with a short scoping call.

talks.headline: Talks & workshops
talks.description: Keynotes and team sessions on multi-agent systems in security, safe simulation, and NIS2-friendly auditability.

intro.headline: First conversation
intro.description: Prefer to start small? We offer a 30-minute intro call to understand your environment and success criteria.

pricing.legal: All prices are indicative and may be delivered through partner SOC/MSSP agreements. Taxes and local fees not included.

thesis.intro: We collaborate with Master's and PhD students on multi-agent systems, safe simulation, explainability, evaluation/reproducibility, reinforcement learning, graph analytics, and auditability for NIS2. You do not need to be from DTU (though we are DTU-connected).

expect.headline: What we expect
expect.description: Clarity of scope, reproducible methods, and written updates.
